articles.title: Australia beat Thailand to set up quarter-final with South Korea at Women's Asian Cup - Reuters
articles.description: Australia defeated Thailand 2-1 at the Women's Asian Cup in Mumbai on Thursday to secure the top spot in Group B and set up a quarter-final clash with South Korea.
articles.content:
